content: **drops crocheted sweater in muskat** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **sizes** small-medium large-extra large finished measurements 98-106 112-120 cm / 38-5/8 - 41 75 44 - 47 25 **materials** drops muskat from garnstudio 300-300 350-400 g color no 19 light gray drops 3 mm / us c crochet hook or size needed to obtain correct gauge
